sqlQuery.name: SampleInfo
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT CONCAT(lrt.transcript_source_id , '_' , edsp.dataset_presenter_id ) as long_read_transcript_id , jsonkey as sample , jsonvalue as count FROM apidb.longreadtranscript lrt , apidb.get_json_vals(lrt.count_data) , apidbtuning.externaldbdatasetpresenter edsp WHERE edsp.external_database_release_id = lrt.external_database_release_id
